issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] MemTable::load() should load partitions in parallel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10251](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10251). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
MemTable::load() should load partitions in parallel using async tasks, rather than loading one partition at a time.

Also, we should make batch size configurable. It is currently hard-coded to 1024\*1024 which can be quite inefficient.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10251?focusedCommentId=17211963) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8428
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8428>
